channel.title: Music – Christopher
channel.description: Recent content in Christopher on Music

item.title: 청하,Christopher - Bad Boy
item.description:
I’m not tryna
be dramatic
But I need
someone
Who can take
a little heat
You wanted thunder
now you have it
I want
a boyfriend
Who can handle
all of me
It feels like
yesterday
Yesterday
yesterday
We were
makin’ out
And reachin’
for the stars
But not today
not today
Not today
‘cause you
Now you say you wanna
bad boy
All
the good girls
Think they need
a bad boy
And
all this time
I’ve tried not to be
a bad boy
What they really do
xhit
I’m not good
at being cool
When it comes to you
when it comes to you
When it comes to you
when it comes to you
First
you’re runnin’ me over
Then you like
why you makin’ a scene
Are you gon blame
this on me~
Don’t be actin’
all sweet to
Get to my head
and then just go mean
Look what you’re doin’
to me
It feels like
yesterday
Yesterday
yesterday
We were
makin’ out
And reachin’
for the stars
But not today
not today
Not today
‘cause you
Now I say I wanna
bad boy
All
the good girls
Think they need
a bad boy
And
all this time
I’ve tried not to be
a bad boy
What they really do
xhit
I’m not good
at being cool
When it comes to you
when it comes to you
When it comes to you
when it comes to you
I cried my eyes out
expectin’ reply
You send me Snapchats
with some other guy
I’m done
with heartaches
Done wastin’ my time
on you
Now you say you wanna
bad boy
All
the good girls
Think they need
a bad boy
And
all this time
I’ve tried not to be
a bad boy
What they really do
xhit
I’m not good
at being cool
When it comes to you
when it comes to you
When it comes to you
when it comes to you
